title: Beautifully remodeled 1Bed/1Bath Heart of Downtown - Walk to SJSU
posting_body: ['Unit 122 | 1 Bed/1 Bath | 325sf | $ 1,550/mo | Avail Aug 1', '** $1,550/mo 12 month lease with $1,550 Security Deposit.', 'Photos: <URL>', 'Virtual Tour:  https://www.theasys.io/.../h9FwtkR69zhhWeKtOdv9ocJ6dH9P3A/', 'Application:  <URL>', 'Schedule Showing: Call or info @ <URL> to request showing', '=======================================================', '• $35 credit application fee.', ' $10/mo renter’s insurance policy required', '• Monthly income must be 3x monthly rent, else co-signer is required.', '• NO SMOKING.', 'NO PETS.', 'NO DRUGS.', 'MAX OCCUPANCY: 2 people', '• SJSU Students Welcome / Co-Signers Welcome', '• Ask about Fall special for qualified SJSU Students', '• Property Description:', '• 12 2  E. San Salvador St City Living At Its Finest!', '• Here’s your chance to live in the heart of downtown San Jose – with all the sights and sounds of the city.', "• Built in the early 1900's, this charming piece of history is at the center of everything.", 'One block from San Jose State University, steps to a market and restaurant, church, Light Rail lines and downtown San Jose nightlife.', 'You won’t find anything this clean, this close to SJSU.', '• Completely remodeled with all modern conveniences (dual-pane windows, insulated walls, new electrical, plumbing, fixtures, roof, central heat etc) and high ceilings with ceiling fans in every room.', 'Custom tiled floors, bright dual-pane windows with window covering, stained glass door, kitchenette (white kitchen cabinets, quartz countertop, stainless steel sink/faucet, countertop induction stove/burner, microwave oven/exhaust, mini fridge/freezer).', '• High ceilings with ceiling fans, A/C, Central Heat, spacious living room/kitchenette, completely remodeled bathroom with large walk-in shower.', '• Large private and tranquil, shaded backyard complete with BBQ and outdoor patio furniture, shared with other tenants.', ' 24/7 Commercial storefront lights and motion sensitive security lights •', 'SUN District Parking Permit available with authorization • Comcast High Speed Internet wired & wireless included.', ' • $35 credit application check/$100 annual renter’s insurance premium at signing', '• •', 'Monthly income must be 3x monthly rent, else co-signer is required.', '• • NO SMOKING.', 'NO PETS.', 'NO DRUGS.', 'MAX OCCUPANCY: 2 people']
